Mar 6, 2024

SecGen 2nd plenary meeting

The second SecGen plenary will happen on March 6th at CISPA, Saarbrücken.

Program

Session on data mining and generation

Time Talk
1:30 Introduction (Pierre-François Gimenez)
1:40 FlowChronicle: pattern mining and generation of time series of network data (Joscha Cüppers and Adrien Schoen)
2:10 New challenges on network data generation (Pierre-François Gimenez)
2:30 Discussion on joint research questions
3:00 Break

Session on anomaly detection

Time Talk
3:30 Going Beyond Familiar Features for Deep Anomaly Detection (Sarath Sivaprasad)
3:50 Towards Automated Network Attack Attribution via Density-Aware Active Learning (Hélène Orsini)
4:20 Adversarial Robustness in Network Intrusion Detection System (Matthieu Mouzaoui)
4:30 Toward Active Online Anomaly Detection (Fabien Pesquerel)
4:40 Discussion on joint research questions
4:55 Closing words

Dinner

At Rosenbar, Saarbrücken

Venue

The event will happen at CISPA – Helmholtz Center for Information Security, Stuhlsatzenhaus 5, 66123 Saarbrücken
